reviewText: Sorry, this wasn't what I expected.  It consisted of a computer screen powerpoint outline with woman's voice over.  Not even a pleasant voice.  The product needed editing: spelling review and to be retitled for specific minority-related bullying.  Also, for 19.95 there should have been more images or pictures, or even film clips.  I regret the purchase, and I regret having opened the package as now I apparently cannot return it.
